name: Toodle's Toboggan
description:
Sled, ski, or snowboard with Toodle the Raccoon and his friends on an endless epic run in Toodle's Toboggan!

FEATURES:
  • Simple controls: drag your finger to steer and tap to perform air tricks.
  • Spin for boosts before each run to earn score and coin multipliers!
  • Many characters to unlock, each with their own stats and abilities.
  • New avatars and level segments will come in future updates. A network connection is required for these updates.
The game is free to play with in-app purchases.

Learn more about us at prismawave.com!
